price: আমাৰ আদেশ অনুসাৰে। নিশ্চয় আমিয়েই ৰাছুল প্ৰেৰণ কৰোঁ।
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
